title: Default Alive: Business Survival Principles
author: Kalpesh Mehta
bookDescription: Survival isn't luck. Itâ€™s a strategy.  Most businesses fail because they run out of cash before they figure out how to make money. Default Alive flips the script, teaching you how to build a business that is sustainable from day one.  Packed with 60 essential principles, this guide cuts through the noise of startup hype to focus on what actually matters: solving real pain points, mastering your margins, and building a high-performing culture.  Whether you are launching your first venture or restructuring an existing one, this book is your roadmap from survival mode to long-term prosperity.  Don't just start a business. Build one that stays alive.
